experiment.win32.cpp

00001 #include <fcntl.h>
00002 #include <io.h>         /* _mktemp */
00003 #include <Windows.h>
00004 #define _S_IREAD 256
00005 #define _S_IWRITE 128
00006 
00007 static inline int
00008 mkstemp(char *tmpl) {
00009   int ret=-1;
00010   mktemp(tmpl);
00011   return open(tmpl,O_RDWR|O_BINARY|O_CREAT|O_EXCL|_O_SHORT_LIVED, _S_IREAD|_S_IWRITE);
00012 }
00013 
00014 /* getpagesize for windows */
00015 static inline long
00016 getpagesize (void) {
00017   static long g_pagesize = 0;
00018   if (! g_pagesize) {
00019         SYSTEM_INFO system_info;
00020         GetSystemInfo (&system_info);
00021         g_pagesize = system_info.dwPageSize;
00022   }
00023   return g_pagesize;
00024 }
00025 
00026 static inline long
00027 getregionsize (void) {
00028   static long g_regionsize = 0;
00029   if (! g_regionsize) {
00030         SYSTEM_INFO system_info;
00031         GetSystemInfo (&system_info);
00032         g_regionsize = system_info.dwAllocationGranularity;
00033   }
00034   return g_regionsize;
00035 }
00036 
00037 #define PROT_WRITE     0
00038 #define PROT_READ      0
00039 #define MAP_SHARED     0
00040 #define MMAP_FAILURE   0
00041 #define MUNMAP_FAILURE 0
00042 
00043 /* mmap for windows */
00044 static void *
00045 mmap (void *ptr, long size, long prot, long type, long handle, long arg) {
00046   static long g_pagesize;
00047   static long g_regionsize;
00048   /* First time initialization */
00049   if (! g_pagesize)
00050         g_pagesize = getpagesize ();
00051   if (! g_regionsize)
00052         g_regionsize = getregionsize ();
00053   /* Allocate this */
00054   ptr = VirtualAlloc (ptr, size,
00055                                           MEM_RESERVE | MEM_COMMIT | MEM_TOP_DOWN,
00056                                           PAGE_READWRITE);
00057   if (! ptr) {
00058         ptr = MMAP_FAILURE;
00059         goto mmap_exit;
00060   }
00061 mmap_exit:
00062   return ptr;
00063 }
00064 
00065 /* munmap for windows */
00066 static long
00067 munmap (void *ptr, long size) {
00068   static long g_pagesize;
00069   static long g_regionsize;
00070   int rc = MUNMAP_FAILURE;
00071   /* First time initialization */
00072   if (! g_pagesize)
00073         g_pagesize = getpagesize ();
00074   if (! g_regionsize)
00075         g_regionsize = getregionsize ();
00076   /* Free this */
00077   if (! VirtualFree (ptr, 0, MEM_RELEASE))
00078         goto munmap_exit;
00079   rc = 0;
00080 munmap_exit:
00081   return rc;
00082 }
